评论详情: If you’re looking to rabbit hole down the barefoot shoe thing, then these are a great start! They’re reasonably affordable compared to many brands so you can try them out without feeling too guilty on the money spent. Once I started wearing these regularly and I went back to others I couldn’t believe how much my feet really “feel” and it does make a difference! I plan to try more of their shoes and even branch out into some other brands. I will say they didn’t hold up quite as long as some of my other shoes. There’s just the slightest peeling of shoe from sole. But not enough to make me stop wearing them and I still give it a good rating despite this. There’s no arch support but that’s obviously intentional and I didn’t have any issues. These are more comfortable than my Birkenstocks because they MOVE!! O wakes all day the zoo and had no trouble! And I used to have terrible arch pain. If you haven’t rabbit holed down the barefoot movement go to Anya’s Reviews and read all about it. It just makes sense when you look at X-rays of conventional shoes vs barefoot! Give em a try!

I have wide feet, but small feet. Trying to find a 6.5 wide shoe is like trying to pull teeth. These ones, I didn't get wide, but the fit so well! I am definalty getting my shoes from them from now on
These fit snug around the heel when tied tight. Great for walking, so comfortable! Stylish &  nice looking.

评论概述: I wish I had them years ago!
评论详情: I had back surgery and was not allowed to bend, lift or twist. Imagine trying to put shoes on when you can’t bend, lift or twist. These shoes were perfect. They look good, they slip on easily. They are comfortable and they give me all the support I need. Most important, you don’t have to bend, lift or twist to put them on.

评论概述: So comfortable and love the style!
评论详情: My feet have never been this comfortable. I will be buying more.
Great shoe but size up when ordering

I wear only barefoot shoes, but these are a bit narrow in the toes. They are comfortable for walking and training, but I would prefer a wider toe box. Additionally, the sizing runs small, so I recommend choosing a larger size. Overall, they are pretty good for the price, and I love the design.

I absolutely love these shoes. They are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. The surprising thing is that they have absolutely no support whatsoever.  I was very suspect when I first put them on but have worn them every chance I can because they are so ridiculously comfortable.  I'm even going to get a pair for work

I've been wearing these shoes almost everyday and my feet aren't hurting me! I stand at my job and most shoes hurt my feet. And I have neuropathy which makes things worse. But I don't have foot pain with these shoes.  I did add a thin insert because my feet were cold  and that's made a big difference.  Would definitely buy again!
I love zero drop shoes. A bit of an impulse purchase… Loved them! Right out of the box. Roomy. Walking, running, hiking or around town - they perform well on or off the trail 👍

评论概述: Shoes that somewhat resolved my problem
评论详情: Seeking a replacement for my cherished all-purpose (running, yoga, water) shoes and finding they no longer exist, I tried five other minimalist options and these shoes won the challenge. Although they don't meet my criteria of working for yoga or water, they do serve my need as a minimalist running shoe. Though they are way more expensive than the shoes I was replacing, hopefully they will be more durable. Plus, they are more attractive as an everyday shoe. The photo and note from the designer is helpful too because I like to support people whose mission is to help others achieve their goals.
For me it’s the best ever walking running I had
My favorite of the barefoot shoe movement
N/A
no women would want to wear tennis shoes
I love Xero shoes! This is one of five pairs I own and I have this style in two colors. Perfect for the gym.

评论概述: Possibly the best thing I've ever worn
评论详情: I can't believe how amazingly comfortable these shoes are. Not only is it not like having anything on but I find all my knee and hip pain is gone because I think I'm finally walking properly. I'm going to buy another pair for when I wear through the first because I plan to wear nothing else. Originally just purchased them for lifting.

I had foot surgery 3 months ago & was finally released to go back to work.  My Dr. told me to purchase a pair of shoes with a wide toe box for long term & I still have some swelling.  I worked the whole week in terrible pain waiting for my new shoes to come in.  ( They shipped very quickly, I just ordered them late)  They came today & tried them on right away.  They are quite possibly the MOST COMFORTABLE shoe I have ever put on.  The wide toe box is exactly what I was hoping for.They are not stylish or even cute, really, but I will wear them to work every single day if they continue to feel this amazing!!
Love these shoes! Super comfy and glad I switched to barefoot

I LOVE THESE SHOES! I have a bunion on my left foot. I literally had to get rid of all my coffin shoes and move to wide toe box shoes - which by the way cured 98% of my foot pain. These are my favorite shoes so far. DO NOT EXPECT CUSHIONING. They are not designed to cushion your feet. They are zero drop, barefoot shoes. That IS the point of these shoes, to give the wearer a barefoot feeling and let one's foot spread out and be comfortable. If your looking for cushion, look elsewhere. BUT if your like me and have extremely wide feet and want to let your toes spread out, look no further, these are the shoes.
LOVE THESE SHOES. VERY LIGHT AND COMFORTABLE.

I generally like these shoes.  I like the feel, the styling, the color and the fit.  They are good for various types of training.  There is very little support in the sole, so they are truly minimalist IMHO.  The only thing I do not like is that the shoelaces are ridiculously long.  I even went to a special lacing method to in effect shorten them a bit, and they are still too long.  It is not good when you step on a lace with your other foot and then the whole lacing just comes undone in the middle of a walk or other activity.
Comfy and pretty

The first pair I purchased I bought in my usual size.  My big toe was jammed up in the front so I returned them and bought a 1/2 size up.  When the new pair came they fit well and I liked that my toes had plenty of room to spread.  My pinky toe gets caught under my other toe and usually ends up with a blister.  What I noticed right away is that there is absolutely no cushioning in these shoes, none.  I went and bought a pair of Dr. Scholl's inserts at the drug store hoping they would help.  They didn't.  My husband and I went on a 4 mile walk.  It's pretty flat and a paved pathway.  About a mile in my heels we're hurting and the bottom of my foot was aching.  It only got worse as the walk went on.  When we got back to the car it was a short drive home and by the time we got there my heels did not want any pressure on them at all and my calves were aching.  I will be returning this pair as well.  I'm disappointed because the toe box is roomy and my pinky toe had an easy time of it.  Unfortunately the rest of my foot didn't.

The shoes are really cute and exactly as described/pictured. There's ample room in the toe box. My mistake was that while I know that they were called "barefoot shoes", I didn't realize that they would be totally flat with no arch support at all. I am planning to try them with insoles and ease into wearing them. EDIT: I actually wore them all day today without insoles and was comfortable. I wouldn't wear them for a Disney World day type of walking, but for a regular shopping day type of walking, they worked great . I think that they will probably mold to my feet.

No more squished toes! Free the toes! This is my second pair, I still have the old ones and use them, but I bought this new pair to make sure I have a new pair in my possession. I've washed my old ones 3 times and they still look clean and presentable. I wear them every day for my exercise program, which includes nature walks, gym work-outs, light weight training, etc...I don't wear them during my Pilates reformer sessions because the instructor insists that we wear the Pilates socks... and when I get home, I continue wearing them because they are that comfortable.  I love my Xero Shoes.
Great shoes!  I wear them pretty much everywhere—anything casual, to work w my scrubs, and to the gym— comfortable and easy to clean.

I have a pair of hfs1 that I love. I have to wear a neutral sole. I wear a 9 1/2 in those and they fit perfectly. I ordered these in a 9 1/2 and they fit a little smaller. My feet are very sensitive. When I put these on I noticed just the slightest bump in the insole and it immediately hurt. I tried taking out the insert and they were too big. They just didn't work for me. I hope they don't change the fit of the original hfs because they're perfect.

I have MS. I try and walk about 5 miles a day minimum and work all kinds of jobs. I broke my 5th metatarsal a few years ago and my foot hurts all of the time… until I found these shoes!! I just wish they were more affordable because I would like some more. I live on a fixed income so it will be awhile til I can afford more, but I cannot wait!!!!!!

I would have never found these without Amazon.  that was an interesting discovery.  What i like:  the toe box of these sneakers.  They are wide and let my toes expand.  I have narrow feet so there lies the paradox.  I also like the look.  I use them for the treadmill as my serious running days are gone.  What I don't like is the lack of arch support b/c I have flat feet.  They also make me look shorter than I already am.  I like them but i am not quite sure if I ready to toss my super cushioned old sneakers.  Finally I think they are a little  pricey.

I never realized how much all shoes pinched my feet until I bought Xeros. Now that I know how comfy they can be, I keep buying more pairs! The color design of this pair is my fav part. Wide toe box people rejoice!

I've only used these a handful of times since I got them in August and while trying to snug them up and tie them today the rubber ripped. So... Pretty low quality. I didn't love how my feet slid around in them anyway. I won't buy them again.

评论概述: Xero shoes connect me to the ground.  Great for walking and Kettlebell training.
评论详情: These shoes were recommended by my personal trainer for kettlebell training and squats.  The flat surface keeps me grounded. I prefer these to my Hokas especially after my hip transplants.

评论概述: It wont work if you have slightly wide foot
评论详情: I returned them and try a half size bigger still hurt my feet, they are stylish and very pretty but if you are looking for a barefoot feel for a wider feet stick with the within brand and thank me later. Ps: I am EE width feet i hope this helps someone and saves you time

I have rolled my ankle a few times and I thought a lower profile shoe might feel more secure which they absolutely are.  I think the bigger toe box allows for more stability as well and they just all around feel great. I actually wear them most of the day and forget that I have them on.
Right fit, super comfy, I just live it!
I like the loose feel and the freedom for my toes.  I am not crazy about the lack of arch support.  I use them for gym workouts, but not for walking on streets or sidewalks

These are an extremely comfortable shoe for my wide flat feet. However, the sole is extremely thin leading me to be concerned about hiking through rocky terrain, and the sole is so smooth I worry about wet conditions.

This is my first time trying barefoot shoes and I'm impressed with these. I have suffered from plantar fasciitis and am working very hard to strengthen my arches so that I can go without supports. So far, these are working well. I wear them for a few hours each morning before moving to something a bit more supportive. I'm finding I can wear these for longer and longer periods. These are barefoot shoes. They are not heavily cushioned or filled with a supportive insole. The color combo is good and they seem to be well made.
I have never had more comfortable sneaker in my life. I’m very happy I tried this brand out!

评论概述: Great workout shoes I can even do a lifting running in them
评论详情: A lot of room for my toes I would say if you’re skeptical on your size go a size up.
I wear these to the gym, I don’t take long walks in them though.

Very comfortable.  My feet feel good in them.  I first ordered size 8 but they felt a bit short so I returned them for an 8 1/2 which is much better.  They are light and very breathable.  I like the style and color.

This shoe is perfect if you have achy feet. It's so light and roomy you barely feel it on your foot. I bought them for Tai Chi but wear them everyday. I did go 1/2 size up. Will definitely find more when these wear out!

评论概述: They are so much better than I anticipated
评论详情: The quality of these sneakers is fantastic. I normally wear a 9.5 so I ordered that size and it fit like a glove, with the grip these sneakers offer I feel more stable than I do when wearing different sneakers. I would buy another pair, even though they are a bit pricey I find them to be worth every penny. They look uber cool as well

Ok. I have officially put these shoes to the test! I have used them for HIGH fitness, Barre, Zumba, walking around at a sporting event where I didn't sit down and skateboarding. My foot pain is gone! Not sure what happened to my feet postpartum, but all my old sneakers and new sneakers of all brands I tried just hurt my feet SO MUCH! These shoes are amazing and I definitely recommend the splurge. I also tried the lesser price barefoot shoes and my feet would hurt so much with those as well. I'm glad I tried this pair. I will be purchasing the Kelso model as well. Also, I had been dealing with some IT band pain and tight knees, not so much anymore (could be a new stretch I'm doing, but could be these shoes too). A DEFINITE YES for me!! I took the tip that someone gave of not over tightening them and I agree. Just let your foot move freely. Tighten enough for your foot not to slip out. Sizing was different, a 7 was perfect gave my toes plenty of room length wise (i have long toes), but I'm normally a 6.5.
These shoes were recommended by my Pilates instructor to help with balance. They are very comfortable as well.

评论概述: My favorite shoe for the gym
评论详情: I'm new to the barefoot style shoe. I love this one, works great for gym classes!
Great shoe

评论概述: Love the show, hate the laces
评论详情: The shoe itself is wonderful. A great barefoot feeling, wide toe box, my feet are so happy and comfortable! The only downside is the laces. They do not stay tied. I double knot them and they still sometimes would come loose. Never had this problem on a shoe before. Also be aware it’s easy to over tighten them which will create pressure points on your foot. I got no tie laces and am much happier.

评论概述: lThey are so comfortable and my feet are not pinched
评论详情: It provides support and comfortable at the same time.  I have the three colors but which they had more of a variety of colors.
Love these shoes! Nice quality, fit perfect and super flat and lightweight. Highly recommend
I live in a city and walk a lot. These sneaks are very comfortable. Fit true to size and are lightweight. Plus look nice.
Fit is perfect and love the feel

评论概述: Very comfortable for wide width feet.
评论详情: My son purchased these sneakers for me. 7.5 size. They fit comfortably and I like them very much. He bought me a violet color, which I love and now I am ordering a black one for the winter. I highly recommend this sneaker.
I like them I'm just not sure just yet it's the right size
Rubber has separated from the fabric. These shoes were worn for one day.  I have heard wonderful reviews and was excited to try out Xero shoes.

I love how the Xero shoes fit and have a wide toe box. Been wearing this brand for over a year and I love it.  The blue on these shoes is super bright and the fit is excellent.  I can wear it straight out of the box and there is no break in period.

I used the size recommend by Amazon and they fit perfectly  I was skeptical at first but the minute I put them on I was sold. Worn them for five days now and my hips and knees are hardly sore. I am 82 yrs old and have tried all orthopedic shoes and orthotics for very painful feet,knees and hips.They helped but nothing like this. Highly, highly recommend.
I ordered the shoe in two sizes, not knowing which would fit. Unfortunately, even the larger size ran slightly small, both in length and in width so I had to return them. Otherwise I liked the shoe.
Just enough cushion for concrete and asphalt with no lift for healthy back. Love these shoes
Great fitting and lightweight.  I purchased my regular size. Comfortable for walking and aerobics.

Das ist bisher der einzige Schuh, der mir richtig passt. Ich habe ihn für Spaziergänge gekauft. Wer breitere Füße hat, sollte aber die Variante für Männer nehmen (eigentlich sind beide Schuhe unisex, nur dass der eine schmaler ist als der andere).
an sich schöne Schuhe, man hat mir bloß die falsche Größe zugeschickt, deswegen gingen sie zurück.

Wish I would have bought them years ago. They give stability and comfort. The wide toe box is an absolute delight for my toes. I play hardcourt volleyball in them and cannot recommend them enough to anyone who's thinking about minimalist shoes for volleyball. I was concerned about the cushioning of my feet (heel area) when jumping and landing and the extra space for my toes felt like the shoe would be loose but have absolutely no issues. My feet don't hurt any more after playing volleyball for 3 hours. I have the feeling that running and jumping in them has improved. Amazing shoe!
They are full of dirt. Not impressed
